author.description:
Artist and Book Publisher
www.objkt.com/@ryanthompson
www.ryanthompson.name

text: 'agam - the elysee salon' is visually the best book about Yaacov Agam that I've come across. With a trim size of close to 11" x 11" these four panel foldouts are huge. The book is great because it shows the artworks from different perspectives which is critical for Agam's work.
